name: nControl「控制」
author: Kevin Bradley & Luca Todesco <kevin@nito.tv>
description: 「在任何支持MFI控制器的应用程序中，使用Sony Dual Shock 4 / Slim，XBox One，Evo VR Pro，8bitdo * 30，iPega I9500和Nintendo Switch Joy-Con / Pro控制器。」Use Sony Dual Shock 4 / Slim, XBox One, Evo VR Pro, 8bitdo *30, iPega I9500 and Nintendo Switch Joy-Con/Pro controllers in any application that supports MFI controllers. Including emulators like Provenance.
